message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which holds significant value for you at $15000. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special price of $14000. This offer is designed to ensure you receive the best value while allowing us to maintain a fair profit margin. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
